) 
 

Display the form for financial Used to show detail, encode a new fin op or update one.

Parameters:
$p_cn database connection
$p_jrn ledger id (jr_id)
$p_submit contains the submit string
$p_array (default=null) containing the $_POST
$p_view_only (default=true) true if we cannot change it (no right or centralized op)
$p_item number of article (default=4)
$p_save (default false) if the operation is already recorded
Returns:
string with the form, in readonly or writable mode
